CVE-2019-12095.title: Horde Webmail Trean Bookmarks cross-site request forgery
CVE-2019-12095.body: Horde Webmail is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Trean Bookmarks. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to perform unauthorized actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of May 17, 2019.

CVE-2019-3576.title: inxedu UserController.java SQL injection
CVE-2019-3576.body: inxedu is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the deleteFavorite in com/inxedu/os/edu/controller/user/UserController.java script using the '{ids}' parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of January 2, 2019.

CVE-2019-4011.title: IBM BigFix Platform cross-site scripting
CVE-2019-4011.body: IBM BigFix Platform 9.2 and 9.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 155885.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4012.title: IBM BigFix SQL injection
CVE-2019-4012.body: IBM BigFix WebUI Profile Management 6 and Software Distribution 23 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 155886.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 875490 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4014.title: IBM DB2 buffer overflow
CVE-2019-4014.body: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, which could allow an authenticated local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system as root. IBM X-Force ID: 155892.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4016.title: IBM DB2 buffer overflow
CVE-2019-4016.body: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, which could allow an authenticated local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system as root. IBM X-ForceID: 155894.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4027.title: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator cross-site scripting
CVE-2019-4027.body: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator 5.2.0.1 through 6.0.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-ForceID: 155905.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 874246 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4028.title: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator cross-site scripting
CVE-2019-4028.body: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator 5.2.0.1 through 6.0.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 155906.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 874246 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4030.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server cross-site scripting
CVE-2019-4030.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5 and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 155946.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4032.title: IBM Financial Transaction Manager SQL injection
CVE-2019-4032.body: IBM Financial Transaction Manager for Digital Payments for Multi-Platform 3.1.0 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-ForceID: 155998.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4033.title: IBM Content Navigator cross-site scripting
CVE-2019-4033.body: IBM Content Navigator 2.0.3 and 3.0CD is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 155999.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 869046 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4034.title: IBM Content Navigator code execution
CVE-2019-4034.body: IBM Content Navigator 3.0CD is could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on a user's workstation. When editing an executable file in ICN with Edit service, it will be executed on the user's workstation. IBM X-Force ID: 156000.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 869066 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4036.title: IBM Security Access Manager denial of service
CVE-2019-4036.body: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance could allow unauthenticated attacker to cause a denial of service in the reverse proxy component. IBM X-Force ID: 156159.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4038.title: IBM Security Identity Manager code injection
CVE-2019-4038.body: IBM Security Identity Manager 6.0 and 7.0 could allow an attacker to create unexpected control flow paths through the application, potentially bypassing security checks. Exploitation of this weakness can result in a limited form of code injection. IBM X-Force ID: 156162.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 869604 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4040.title: IBM i cross-site scripting
CVE-2019-4040.body: IBM I 7.2 and 7.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 156164.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4045.title: IBM Business Automation Workflow gain access
CVE-2019-4045.body: IBM Business Automation Workflow and IBM Business Process Manager 18.0.0.0, 18.0.0.1, and 18.0.0.2 provide embedded document management features. Because of a missing restriction in an API, a client might spoof the last modified by value of a document. IBM X-Force ID: 156241.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 870494 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4047.title: IBM Jazz Reporting Service information disclosure
CVE-2019-4047.body: IBM Jazz Reporting Service (JRS) 6.0.6 could allow an authenticated user to access the execution log files as a guest user, and obtain the information of the server execution. IBM X-Force ID: 156243.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 882262 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4048.title: IBM Maximo Asset Management information disclosure
CVE-2019-4048.body: IBM Maximo Asset Management 7.6 could allow a physical user of the system to obtain sensitive information from a previous user of the same machine. IBM X-Force ID: 156311.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4049.title: IBM MQ denial of service
CVE-2019-4049.body: IBM MQ 9.1.0.0, 9.1.0.1, 9.1.1, and 9.1.0.2 is vulnerable to a denial of service due to a local user being able to fill up the disk space of the underlying filesystem using the error logging service. IBM X-Force ID: 156398.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4051.title: IBM API Connect information disclosure
CVE-2019-4051.body: Some URIs in IBM API Connect 2018.1 and 2018.4.1.3 disclose system specification information like the machine id, system uuid, filesystem paths, network interface names along with their mac addresses. An attacker can use this information in targeted attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 156542.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 879395 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4055.title: IBM MQ denial of service
CVE-2019-4055.body: IBM MQ 8.0.0.0 through 8.0.0.10, 9.0.0.0 through 9.0.0.5, and 9.1.0.0 through 9.1.1 is vulnerable to a denial of service attack within the TLS key renegotiation function. IBM X-Force ID: 156564.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4073.body: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 6.0.0.0 and 6.0.0.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. CVE-2019-4083.title: IBM Jazz Foundation cross-site scripting
CVE-2019-4083.body: IBM Jazz Foundation products (IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 6.0 through 6.0.6.1) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 157383.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4087.title: IBM Spectrum Protect buffer overflow
CVE-2019-4087.body: IBM Spectrum Protect Servers 7.1 and 8.1 and Storage Agents are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by servers and storage agents in response to specifically crafted communication exchanges. By sending an overly long request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with instance id privileges or cause the server or storage agent to crash. IBM X-Force ID: 157510.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 882472 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4095.title: IBM Cloud Pak System cross-site request forgery
CVE-2019-4095.body: IBM Cloud Pak System 2.3 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 158015.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4101.title: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows denial of service
CVE-2019-4101.body: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 is vulnerable to a denial of service. Users that have both EXECUTE on PD_GET_DIAG_HIST and access to the diagnostic directory on the DB2 server can cause the instance to crash. IBM X-Force ID: 158091.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4106.body: IBM WebSphere eXtreme Scale 8.6 Admin Console is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 158099.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4112.title: IBM WebSphere eXtreme Scale information disclosure
CVE-2019-4112.body: IBM WebSphere eXtreme Scale 8.6 Admin Console allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 158105.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4119.body: IBM Cloud Private Kubernetes API server 2.1.0, 3.1.0, 3.1.1, and 3.1.2 can be used as an HTTP proxy to not only cluster internal but also external target IP addresses. IBM X-Force ID: 158145.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4120.body: IBM Cloud Private 3.1.1 and 3.1.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. CVE-2019-4140.title: IBM Spectrum Protect data manipulation
CVE-2019-4140.body: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager Server (IBM Spectrum Protect 7.1 and 8.1) could allow a local user to replace existing databases by restoring old data. CVE-2019-4174.title: IBM Cognos Controller information disclosure
CVE-2019-4174.body: IBM Cognos Controller 10.2.0, 10.2.1, 10.3.0, 10.3.1, and 10.4.0 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 158879.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4177.title: IBM Cognos Controller information disclosure
CVE-2019-4177.body: IBM Cognos Controller 10.2.0, 10.2.1, 10.3.0, 10.3.1, and 10.4.0 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 158882.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4178.title: IBM Cognos Analytics path traversal
CVE-2019-4178.body: IBM Cognos Analytics 11 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to write or view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 158919.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 879079 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4184.title: IBM Jazz Reporting Service cross-site scripting
CVE-2019-4184.body: IBM Jazz Reporting Service 6.0 through 6.0.6.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 158974.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 884604 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4193.title: IBM Jazz for Service Management information disclosure
CVE-2019-4193.body: IBM Jazz for Service Management 1.1.3 and 1.1.3.2 stores sensitive information in URL parameters. This may lead to information disclosure if unauthorized parties have access to the URLs via server logs, referrer header or browser history. IBM X-force ID: 159032.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 0885985 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4202.title: IBM API Connect command injection
CVE-2019-4202.body: IBM API Connect 5.0.0.0 and 5.0.8.6 Developer Portal is vulnerable to command injection. An attacker with a specially crafted request can run arbitrary code on the server and gain complete access to the system. IBM X-Force ID: 159123.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 880109 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4261.title: IBM MQ denial of service
CVE-2019-4261.body: IBM WebSphere MQ V7.1, 7.5, IBM MQ V8, IBM MQ V9.0LTS, IBM MQ V9.1 LTS, and IBM MQ V9.1 CD are vulnerable to a denial of service attack caused by specially crafted messages. IBM X-Force ID: 160013.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4266.title: IBM Maximo Anywhere information disclosure
CVE-2019-4266.body: IBM Maximo Anywhere 7.6.2.0, 7.6.2.1, 7.6.3.0, and 7.6.3.1 does not have device jailbreak detection which could result in an attacker gaining sensitive information about the device. IBM X-Force ID: 160199.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6205923 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4267.title: IBM Spectrum Protect buffer overflow
CVE-2019-4267.body: The IBM Spectrum Protect 7.1 and 8.1 Backup-Archive Client is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. This could allow execution of arbitrary code on the local system or the application to crash. IBM X-Force ID: 160200.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4268.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server information disclosure
CVE-2019-4268.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 160201.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4270.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server cross-site scripting

CVE-2019-4271.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server HTTP pollution
CVE-2019-4271.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 Admin console is vulnerable to a Client-side HTTP parameter pollution vulnerability. IBM X-Force ID: 160243.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4285.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server - Liberty clickjacking
CVE-2019-4285.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server - Liberty Admin Center could allow a remote attacker to hijack the clicking action of the victim. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to hijack the victim's click actions or launch other client-side browser attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 160513.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4294.title: IBM MQ code execution
CVE-2019-4294.body: IBM DataPower Gateway 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.6, 7.6.0.0 through 7.6.0.15 and IBM MQ Appliance 8.0.0.0 through 8.0.0.12, 9.1.0.0 through 9.1.0.2, and 9.1.1 through 9.1.2 could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by a command injection vulnerability. IBM X-Force ID: 16188.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4303.title: IBM Maximo Asset Management cross-site scripting

CVE-2019-4322.title: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows buffer overflow
CVE-2019-4322.body: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, which could allow an authenticated local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system as root. IBM X-Force ID: 161202.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4329.title: IBM Security Guardium Big Data Intelligence security bypass
CVE-2019-4329.body: IBM Security Guardium Big Data Intelligence (SonarG) 4.0 uses incomplete blacklisting for input validation which allows attackers to bypass application controls resulting in direct impact to the system and data integrity. IBM X-Force ID: 161209.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4342.title: IBM Cognos Analytics cross-site scripting
CVE-2019-4342.body: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.0 and 11.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 161421.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4349.title: IBM Maximo Anywhere information disclosure
CVE-2019-4349.body: IBM Maximo Anywhere 7.6.2.0, 7.6.2.1, 7.6.3.0, and 7.6.3.1 applications can be installed on a deprecated operating system version that could compromised the confidentiality and integrity of the service. IBM X-Force ID: 161486Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6358059 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4378.title: IBM MQ denial of service
CVE-2019-4378.body: IBM MQ 7.5.0.0 - 7.5.0.9, 7.1.0.0 - 7.1.0.9, 8.0.0.0 - 8.0.0.12, 9.0.0.0 - 9.0.0.6, 9.1.0.0 - 9.1.0.2, and 9.1.0 - 9.1.2 command server is vulnerable to a denial of service attack caused by an authenticated and authorized user using specially crafted PCF messages. IBM X-Force ID: 162084.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4384.title: IBM Campaign directory traversal
CVE-2019-4384.body: IBM Campaign 9.1.2 and 10.1 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 162172.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4387.title: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator SQL injection
CVE-2019-4387.body: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.2.0 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 162715.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1115109 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4397.title: IBM Cloud Orchestrator information disclosure
CVE-2019-4397.body: IBM Cloud Orchestrator and IBM Cloud Orchestrator Enterprise 2.5 through 2.5.0.9 and 2.4 through 2.4.0.5 stores sensitive information in URL parameters. This may lead to information disclosure if unauthorized parties have access to the URLs via server logs, referrer header or browser history. IBM X-Force ID: 162239Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4400.title: IBM Cloud Orchestrator information disclosure
CVE-2019-4400.body: IBM Cloud Orchestrator 2.4 through 2.4.0.5 and 2.5 through 2.5.0.9 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 162261.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4402.title: IBM API Connect denial of service
CVE-2019-4402.body: IBM API Connect 2018.1 through 2018.4.1.6 developer portal could allow an unauthorized user to cause a denial of service via an unprotected API. IBM X-Force ID: 162263.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4403.title: IBM Connections cross-site scripting
CVE-2019-4403.body: IBM Connections 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 162264.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4406.title: IBM Spectrum Protect Backup-Archive Client denial of service
CVE-2019-4406.body: IBM Spectrum Protect Backup-Archive Client 7.1 and 8.1 may be vulnerable to a denial of service attack due to a timing issue between client and server TCP/IP communications. IBM X-Force ID: 162477.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1107777 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4442.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server information disclosure
CVE-2019-4442.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9,0 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the file system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to view arbitrary files on the system but not content. IBM X-Force ID: 163226.For IBM products: Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4444.title: IBM API Connect information disclosure
CVE-2019-4444.body: IBM API Connect 2018.1 through 2018.4.1.7 Developer Portal's user registration page does not disable password autocomplete. An attacker with access to the browser instance and local system credentials can steal the credentials used for registration. IBM X-Force ID: 163453.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1126833 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4448.title: IBM DB2 High Performance Unload privilege escalation
CVE-2019-4448.body: IBM DB2 High Performance Unload load for LUW 6.1, 6.1.0.1, 6.1.0.1 IF1, 6.1.0.2, 6.1.0.2 IF1, and 6.1.0.1 IF2 db2hpum and db2hpum_debug binaries are setuid root and have built-in options that allow an low privileged user the ability to load arbitrary db2 libraries from a privileged context. This results in arbitrary code being executed with root authority. IBM X-Force ID: 163489.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4536.title: IBM i privilege escalation
CVE-2019-4536.body: IBM i 7.4 users who have done a Restore User Profile (RSTUSRPRF) on a system which has been configured with Db2 Mirror for i might have user profiles with elevated privileges caused by incorrect processing during a restore of multiple user profiles. A user with restore privileges could exploit this vulnerability to obtain elevated privileges on the restored system. IBM X-Force ID: 165592.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1071586 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4541.title: IBM Security Directory Server security bypass
CVE-2019-4541.body: IBM Security Directory Server 6.4.0 uses incomplete blacklisting for input validation which allows attackers to bypass application controls resulting in direct impact to the system and data integrity. IBM X-Force ID: 165814.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1288660 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4656.title: IBM MQ denial of service

CVE-2019-4686.title: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption information disclosure
CVE-2019-4686.body: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 3.0.0.2 does not set the secure attribute on authorization tokens or session cookies. Attackers may be able to get the cookie values by sending a http:// link to a user or by planting this link in a site the user goes to. The cookie will be sent to the insecure link and the attacker can then obtain the cookie value by snooping the traffic. IBM X-Force ID: 171822.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6320835 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4689.title: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption information disclosure
CVE-2019-4689.body: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 3.0.0.2 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 171826.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6320835 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4691.title: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption cross-site scripting
CVE-2019-4691.body: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 3.0.0.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 171828.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6320835 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4692.title: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption information disclosure
CVE-2019-4692.body: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 3.0.0.2 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 171829.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6320817 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4701.title: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption information disclosure
CVE-2019-4701.body: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 3.0.0.2 is deployed with active debugging code that can create unintended entry points. IBM X-Force ID: 171936.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6320817 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4705.title: IBM Security Identity Manager Virtual Appliance information disclosure
CVE-2019-4705.body: IBM Security Identity Manager Virtual Appliance 7.0.2 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 172015.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2019-4713.title: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption code execution
CVE-2019-4713.body: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 3.0.0.2 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 172084.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6320817 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4715.title: IBM Spectrum Scale command execution
CVE-2019-4715.body: IBM Spectrum Scale 4.2 and 5.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 172093.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1118913 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4716.title: IBM Planning Analytics code execution
CVE-2019-4716.body: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0.0 through 2.0.8 is vulnerable to a configuration overwrite that allows an unauthenticated user to login as "admin", and then execute code as root or SYSTEM via TM1 scripting. IBM X-Force ID: 172094.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1127781 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4718.title: IBM Jazz for Service Management cross-site scripting
CVE-2019-4718.body: IBM Jazz for Service Management 3.13 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 172123.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6113470 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4722.title: IBM Cognos Analytics information disclosure
CVE-2019-4722.body: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.0 and 11.1 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information via a stack trace due to mishandling of certain error conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 172128.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6451705 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-4752.title: IBM Emptoris SQL injection
CVE-2019-4752.body: IBM Emptoris Spend Analysis and IBM Emptoris Strategic Supply Management Platform 10.1.0.x, 10.1.1.x, and 10.1.3.x is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 173348.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 2948919 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-5595.title: FreeBSD callee-save registers information disclosure
CVE-2019-5595.body: FreeBSD could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper input validation by the callee-save registers. By sending specially-crafted arguments, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Refer to FreeBSD Security Advisory FreeBSD-SA-19:01.syscall for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2019-6159.title: IBM System x IMM (IMM v1) cross-site scripting
CVE-2019-6159.body: IBM System x is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the legacy IBM System x IMM (IMM v1) embedded Baseboard Management Controller (BMC). A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Lenovo Security Advisory: LEN-24785 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.
